mapper.select: SELECT SNO, USERID, to_char(SSTART, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as "START", to_char(SEND, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as END, STITLE as TITLE, SCOLOR as color ,SPLACE, SMEMO FROM SCHEDULE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE (SNO, USERID, SSTART, SEND, SMEMO, STITLE, SCOLOR) VALUES (schedule_sequence.NEXTVAL, #{userid}, #{start}, #{end}, #{smemo}, #{title}, '#'||lpad(trim(to_char(floor(dbms_random.value(0,16777216)),'XXXXXX')),6,'0'))
